PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meta por Vertical
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_METASVERTICAL.GER_PROD.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (SELECT DISTINCT(HANDLE) FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL V JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO), ',') ON VALUE = V.HANDLE)) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_METASVERTICAL/form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
